K02pspdut2u:2: 00103 yā tvaṃ sarvān avadyāṅgi niravadyair nirīkṣyase//
K02pspdut2u:4: 00105 yas tvāṃ paśyati bhāvena sa paśyati tathāgatam//
K02pspdut2u:6: 00107 na paśyanty antaraṃ santaś candracandrikayor iva//
K02pspdut2u:9: 00110 sakṛd apy āśaye śuddhe yas tvāṃ vidhivad īkṣate/
K02pspdut2u:12: 00202 poṣikā janayitrī ca mātā tvam asi vatsalā//
K02pspdut2u:13: 00203 yad buddhā lokaguravaḥ putrās tava kṛpālavaḥ/
K02pspdut2u:20: 00210 tvāṃ prāpya pralayaṃ yānti doṣā vādāś ca vādinām//
K02pspdut2u:23: 00213 yasya tvayy apy abhiṣvaṅgas tvannāthasya na vidyate/
K02pspdut2u:25: 00215 nāgacchasi kutaś cittaṃ na ca kvacana gacchasi/
K02pspdut2u:26: 00216 sthāneṣv api ca sarveṣu vidvadbhir nopalabhyase//
K02pspdut2u:27: 00217 ye tvām evaṃ na paśyanti prapadyante ca bhāvataḥ/
K02pspdut2u:28: 00218 prapadya ca vimucyante tad idaṃ mahad adbhutam//
K02pspdut2u:29: 00301 tvām eva badhyate paśyann apaśyann api badhyate/
K02pspdut2u:30: 00302 tvām eva mucyate paśyann apaśyann api mucyate//
K02pspdut2u:32: 00304 sudurbodhāsi māyeva dṛśyase na ca dṛśyase//
K02pspdut2u:33: 00305 buddhaiḥ prayekabuddhaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca niṣevitā/
K02pspdut2u:34: 00306 mārgas tvam eko mokṣasya nāsty anya iti niścayaḥ//
K02pspdut2u:36: 00308 kṛpayā lokanāthais tvam ucyase ca na cocyase//
K02pspdut2u:37: 00309 śaktaḥ kas tvām iha stotuṃ nirnimittāṃ nirañjanām/
K02pspdut2u:39: 00311 saty evam api saṃvṛtyā vākpathair vayam īdṛśaiḥ/
K02pspdut2u:40: 00312 tvām astutyām api stutvā tuṣṭūṣantaḥ sunirvṛtāaḥ/
K02pspdut2u:42: 00314 tenās tv āśu jagat kṛtsnaṃ prajñāpāraparāyaṇam//
K02pspdut2u:43: 00401 evaṃ mayā śrutam/ ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma
K02pspdut2u:44: 00402 gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair
K02pspdut2u:46: 00403 kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyai-

K02pspdut2u:49: 00406 pañcamātrair bhikṣuṇīśatair upāsakair upāsikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ sarvair dṛṣṭadharmair apari-

K02pspdut2u:72: 00507 dattena ca varuṇadattena ca śubhaguptena ca indradattena ca uttaramatinā ca viśeṣa-
K02pspdut2u:73: 00508 matinā ca vardhamānamatinā ca amoghadarśinā ca susamprasthitena ca suvi-
K02pspdut2u:74: 00509 krāntavikramiṇā ca nityodyuktena ca anikṣiptadhureṇa ca
K02pspdut2u:75: sūryagarbheṇa ca 00510 anupamacintinā ca avalokiteśvareṇa ca mahāsthāmaprāptena ca mañju-
K02pspdut2u:76: 00511 śriyā ca vajramatinā ca ratnamudrāhastena ca nityokṣiptahastena ca maitre-
K02pspdut2u:77: 00512 yeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evam pramukhair anekair
K02pspdut2u:80: 00514 atha khalu bhagavān svayam eva siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā 00515 ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya abhimukhīṃ smṛtim upasthāpya samādhirājaṃ nāma
K02pspdut2u:81: 00516 samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma yatra sarvasamādhayo 'ntargamān saṃgrahaṃ
K02pspdut2u:84: 00518 atha khalu bhagavān smṛtimān samprajānaṃs tasmāt samādher vyutthāya
K02pspdut2u:85: 00601 divyena cakṣuṣā sarvalokadhātuṃ vyavalokya sarvakāyāt smitam akarot/
K02pspdut2u:92: 00605 ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jānumaṇḍalābhyām evaṃ dvābhyām ūrubhyāṃ kaṭinābhimaṇḍalābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ 00606 pārśvābhyāṃ hṛdayaśrīvatsāt mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāt/ evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir daśabhyo
K02pspdut2u:93: 00607 hastāṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyām
K02pspdut2u:95: 00608 yāś catvāriṃśadbhyo dantebhyo dvābhyāṃ ghrāṇābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ
K02pspdut2u:96: śrotrābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ 00609 cakṣurbhyāṃ madhyādūrṇāyā upariṣṭād uṣṇīṣāt ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī raśmikoṭīniyuta-
K02pspdut2u:97: 00610 śatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ yai raśmibhir ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro
K02pspdut2u:101: 00612 dhātavas tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan/
K02pspdut2u:103: 00613 ṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ
K02pspdut2u:105: 00614 paścimottarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātava-
K02pspdut2u:106: 00615 s tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan/ ye ca sattvās tena 00616 mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitās te sarve niyatā abhūvan anu-
K02pspdut2u:108: 00701 atha khalu bhagavān punar eva sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ smitam akarot/
K02pspdut2u:109: evakikataś ca 00702 romakūpāt ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ/ yair ayaṃ 00703 trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsitaḥ sphuṭo 'bhūt/ taiś ca pūrvasyāṃ
K02pspdut2u:112: 00705 ś cābhūvan/ evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ {{diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan/ ye ca sattvās tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitās te sarve niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ}}
K02pspdut2u:115: 00707 atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yā sā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
K02pspdut2u:116: prakṛtiprabhā tayā 00708 prabhayā trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum avabhāsayāmāsa/ yāvat sarvāsu 00709 daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavayas tā
K02pspdut2u:117: 00710 prabhayā avabhāsitā abhūvan/ ye ca sattvās tayā prabhayā spṛṣṭās te sarve 00711 niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau//
K02pspdut2u:118: 00712 atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmayāmāsa/
K02pspdut2u:122: 00714 mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇa sphuritvā tasmāj jihvendriyāt
K02pspdut2u:125: 00716 raśmimukhe caikaikasminn uttamaratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi 00717 padmāny utpannāny abhūvan/ teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇāḥ saṃsthitā-
K02pspdut2u:126: 00718 ś cābhūvan dharmaṃ deśayanto yad uta imām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharma-
K02pspdut2u:129: 00720 dhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma/ evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyā-
K02pspdut2u:130: 00801 m uttarasyām adhastād ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu/ evakikasyāṃ ca diśi daśasu dikṣu gaṅgā-
K02pspdut2u:131: 00802 nadīvālukopameṣu aparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ
K02pspdut2u:133: 00803 sma yad uta imām eva ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām/ ye ca sattvā-
K02pspdut2u:134: 00804 s tāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvanti te niyatā bhavanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau/
K02pspdut2u:135: 00805 atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ 00806 nāma samādhiṃ samāpede/ tathārupaṃ carddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma 00807 yathārūpeṇarddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro loka-
K02pspdut2u:136: 00808 dhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāram akampata prākampata saṃprākampata/ acalat prācalat 00809 saṃprācalat/ avedhat prāvedhat saṃprāvedhat/ araṇat prāraṇat 00810 saṃprāraṇat/ akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat saṃprākṣubhyat/ agarjat prāgarjat 00811 saṃprāgarjat/ ante unnamati madhye avanamati, madhye unnamati ante
K02pspdut2u:138: 00813 atha khalu tena kṣaṇalavamuhvartena ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre
K02pspdut2u:140: 00814 dhātau nirayā vā tiryagyonayo vā yamalokā vā te sarve samucchinnāḥ
K02pspdut2u:141: 00815 śūnyā abhūvan/ sarvākṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan/ ye ca sattvās tābhyo
K02pspdut2u:142: 00816 nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś cyūtās te sarvae tenaiva prītiprāmodyena
K02pspdut2u:143: 00817 manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannāś cābhūvan/ evaṃ cāturmahārāajikānāṃ 00818 devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmita-
K02pspdut2u:145: 00901 atha khalu te manuṣyās te ca devā bhagavata evānubhāvena
K02pspdut2u:147: 00902 smaranti sma/ anusmṛtya ca tenaiva prītiprāmodyena yena bhagavāṃs
K02pspdut2u:149: 00903 saṃkrāntāḥ/ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir abhivandya bhagavantaṃ
K02pspdut2u:150: 00904 prāñjalayo bhūtvā namasyanti sma/ evaṃ pūrvasyṃ diśi
K02pspdut2u:152: 00905 meṣu lokadhātuṣu dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣūrdhvam
K02pspdut2u:154: 00906 d daśasu dikṣvaikasmin digbhāge gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
K02pspdut2u:156: 00907 nirayāḥ sarvās tiryagyonayaḥ sarve yamalokāḥ samucchinnāḥ śūnyā
K02pspdut2u:158: 00908 sarvākṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan/ ye ca sattvās tābhyo
K02pspdut2u:160: 00909 yamalokagatibhyaś cyutās te sarve devamanuṣyeṣūpapadyante sma/ te ca devam anu-
K02pspdut2u:161: 00910 ṣyeṣūpapannā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvanivāsam anusmaranti sma/
K02pspdut2u:162: anusmṛtya ca 00911 tenaiva prītiprāmodyena svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye tatra buddhā bhagavanta utpannā-
K02pspdut2u:163: 00912 s teṣām antikam upasaṃkrāntāḥ/ upasaṃkramya teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ
K02pspdut2u:165: 00913 vandanāṃ kṛtvā sarve prāñjalayo bhūtvā bhagavato namasyanti sma/
K02pspdut2u:166: 00914 atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau jātyandhāḥ
K02pspdut2u:167: 00915 sattvās te cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma/ vadhirāḥ sattvāḥ śrotreṇa
K02pspdut2u:169: 00916 śṛṇvanti sma/ unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabhante sma/ vikṣiptacittā
K02pspdut2u:170: 00917 ekāgracittā bhavanti sma/ jighatsitāḥ pūrṇapātrā bhavanti sma/
K02pspdut2u:171: 00918 tṛṣitā vigatapipāsā bhavanti sma/ rogaspṛṣṭā viagatarogā bhavanti
K02pspdut2u:172: 00919 sma/ hīnendriyāḥ paripūrṇendriyā bhavanti sma/ avirahitākuśala-
K02pspdut2u:174: 01001 bhavanti sma/ sarvasattvāś ca mātāpitṛsamacittā bhavanti sma,
K02pspdut2u:177: 01003 sevinaś ca bhavanti sma/ brahmacāriṇaḥ śucayo nirāmayagandhāḥ
K02pspdut2u:178: sarvasattvāś ca 01004 sarvasukhasamarpitā īdṛśaṃ sukhaṃ pratlabhante sma tad yathāpi nāma tṛtīyadhyāna-
K02pspdut2u:179: 01005 samāpannasya bhikṣoḥ tasminn eva ca samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñayā te
K02pspdut2u:181: 01006 bhavanti sma/ yad anyabuddhakṣetrasthā buddhā bhagavanta evam udānayanti sma 01007 sādhu damaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu vīrṇo brahmacaryyāvāsaḥ sādhu prāṇibhūte-
K02pspdut2u:183: 01009 atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva saṃhāsane niṣanaḥ imaṃ trisāhasramahā-
K02pspdut2u:184: 01010 sāhasraṃ lokadhātum abhibhūya tathāgatas tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma
K02pspdut2u:185: 01011 ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca/ pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ
K02pspdut2u:187: 01012 m uttarasyām adhastād ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamān
K02pspdut2u:188: lokadhātūn abhibhūya 01013 tathāgatas tiṣṭhati bhāsate/ tad yathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvaparvatā-
K02pspdut2u:189: 01014 n abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate {{tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena
K02pspdut2u:191: 01015 evam eva bhagavān sarvalokadhātūn abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate
K02pspdut2u:193: 01016 tejasā ca/ evam eva bhagavān sarvalokadhātūn abhibhūya 01017 tiṣṭhati bhāsate {{tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā}} tejasā
K02pspdut2u:195: 01018 atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yādṛk trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau
K02pspdut2u:196: 01019 sattvānām ātmabhāvas tatsamānam ātmabhāvaṃ prākṛtam upadarśayāmāsa/
K02pspdut2u:197: atha khalu 01020 ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau śuddhāvāsakāyikā devāḥ
K02pspdut2u:199: 01101 kṛtvā ābhāsvarā brahmakāyikā devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaś ca
K02pspdut2u:201: 01102 ratayaś ca tuṣitāś ca yāmāś ca trayastriṃśāś ca cāturmahārājakāyikāś
K02pspdut2u:203: 01103 taṃ tathāgasyāsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā divyāḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavile-
K02pspdut2u:206: 01105 saugandhikapuṇḍarīkapadmāni gṛhītvā divyāni ca keśaratamālapatrāṇi 01106 gṛhītvā yena tathāgatasyāsecanaka ātmabhāvas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/ ye ceha 01107 trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau manuṣyās te 'pi taṃ
K02pspdut2u:208: 01108 m ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthalajalajāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena
K02pspdut2u:211: 01110 atha khalu te devās te ca mānuṣās tābhir divyābhiḥ puṣpadhūpagandha-
K02pspdut2u:214: 01112 puṣpais tathāgatakāyam avakiranti sma abhyavakiranti sma/
K02pspdut2u:217: 01114 patākāvaijayantīvarṣaiḥ sthalajalajaiś ca puṣpair bhagavān avakīrṇas
K02pspdut2u:221: 01116 m ekaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ saṃsthitam abhūt/ tataś ca kūṭāgārāt tāni divyāni 01117 puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni lambante pralambante sma/ taiś ca puṣpadāmabhiḥ
K02pspdut2u:223: 01118 ś cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur atīvāśobhata/ tena ca suvarṇa-
K02pspdut2u:224: 01119 varṇena bhagavataḥ prabhāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu prasṛtena ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgā-
K02pspdut2u:225: 01201 nadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭāvabhāsitāś cābhūvan/ asmiṃś ca 01202 trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarveṣu cāturdvīpakeṣu lokadhātuṣu teṣāṃ
K02pspdut2u:226: 01203 devamanuṣyāṇāñ ca ekaikasyaitad abhūt/ mama puratas tathāgato niṣaṇo
K02pspdut2u:228: 01205 atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇaḥ punar eva smitam
K02pspdut2u:231: 01207 yāvad daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan/
K02pspdut2u:233: 01208 ca trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau sattvās te sarve pūrvasyāṃ diśi
K02pspdut2u:235: 01209 nadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma
K02pspdut2u:237: 01210 tasyāñ ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te
K02pspdut2u:238: 01211 sarve imāṃ sahālokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniṃ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ
K02pspdut2u:239: 01212 bhikṣusaṃghena/ evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ
K02pspdut2u:240: 01213 dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adha ūrdhvaṃ digbhāgaṃ gaṅgānadīvālu-
K02pspdut2u:241: 01214 kopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma
K02pspdut2u:243: 01215 ca gaṅānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te sarve imāṃ sahāloka-
K02pspdut2u:244: 01216 dhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniñ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ bhikusaṃghena/
K02pspdut2u:245: 01217 atha khalu pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya
K02pspdut2u:246: 01218 tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātū ratnāvatī nāma tatra ratnākaro nāma
K02pspdut2u:247: 01219 tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati/ sa imām eva
K02pspdut2u:248: 01220 prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati/ atha tatra lokadhātau

K02pspdut2u:8269: 25506 {{yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate/ tasmin samaye samādhidhāraṇīmukhāni
K02pspdut2u:8270: nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati}} nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samādhi-
K02pspdut2u:8271: 25507 dhāraṇīmukhānīmāni/ tat kasya hetoḥ/ tathā hi bhagavan {bodhisattvo}
K02pspdut2u:8273: 25508 prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati yāvad vyastasamastāni
K02pspdut2u:8280: 25512 tathā hi bhagavan yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpam/ yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ 25513 yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam iti hi vijñānaṃ cānutpādaś
K02pspdut2u:8282: 25514 dvaidhīkāram/ {{yo bhagavan cakṣuro 'nutpādo na tad cakṣuḥ/ yo śrotrasya ghrāṇasya jihvāyāḥ kāyasya yo manaso 'nutpādo na tad mana iti hi manaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram/ yo bhagavan rūpasyānutpādo
K02pspdut2u:8283: na tad rūpam/ yo śabdasya gandhasya rasasya spraṣṭavyasya yo
K02pspdut2u:8284: dharmasyānutpādo na sa dharma iti hi dharmaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad
K02pspdut2u:8285: advaidhīkāram/ yo bhagavan cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tad cakṣurvijñānam/
K02pspdut2u:8286: yo śrotravijñānasya ghrāṇavijñānasya jihvāvijñānasya kāyavijñānasya yo manovijñānasyānutpādo na tad manovijñānam iti hi manovijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram/ yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā
K02pspdut2u:8287: dānapāramitā/ yo śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā iti hi prajñāpāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram/ yo bhagavan adhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na tad adhyātmaśūnyatā/ yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā mahāśūnyatāyāḥ
K02pspdut2u:8288: paramārthaśūnyatāyāḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā atyantaśūnyatāyā anavarāgraśūnyatāyā anavakāraśūnyatāyāḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anupalambhaśūnyatāyā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā bhāvaśūnyatāyā abhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā yaḥ parabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā parabhāvaśūnyatā iti hi parabhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram/}}
K02pspdut2u:8289: 25515 {{yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni/
K02pspdut2u:8290: yo samyakprahāṇānām ṛddhipādānām indriyānāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ mārgānām apramāṇadhyānānām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ daśabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidānāṃ yo 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmānām anutpādo na te buddhadharmā iti hi}} buddhadharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad a-
K02pspdut2u:8291: 25516 dvaidhīkāram/ yo bhagavan dharmadhātor anutpādo na sa dharmadhātuḥ/
K02pspdut2u:8292: yas tathatāyā 25517 ākāśadhātor bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātor bodher yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā
K02pspdut2u:8293: anutpādo na 25518 sā sarvākārajñateti hi sarvākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad
K02pspdut2u:8295: 25519 kasya hetoḥ/ tathā hi anutpādo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak/
K02pspdut2u:8297: 25520 yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā/
K02pspdut2u:8298: 25521 yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpam/ yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ
K02pspdut2u:8300: 25522 yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam/ iti hi skandhāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad a-
K02pspdut2u:8301: 25523 dvaidhīkāram/ tat kasya hetoḥ/ tathā hi vyayo na eko na dvau na bahavo na 25524 pṛtahk/ tasmād yaḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ vyayo na te pañca skandhāḥ/
K02pspdut2u:8303: 25601 dānapāramitāyā vyayo {{na sā dānapāramitā/ yo bhagavan śīlapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā/ yo bhagavan kṣāntipāramitāyā
K02pspdut2u:8304: vyayo na sā dānapāramitā/ yo bhagavan vīryapāramitāyā vyayo na sā
K02pspdut2u:8305: dānapāramitā/ yo bhagavan dhyānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā/ yo bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā/}}
K02pspdut2u:8306: 25602 {{yo bhagavan adhyātmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā/ yo bhagavan bahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā/ yo bhagavan adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā/ yo bhagavan śūnyatāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā/ yo bhagavan mahāśūnyatāyā
K02pspdut2u:8307: vyayo na sā mahāśūnyatā/ yo bhagavan paramārthaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā
